title: Fake image of explosion near Pentagon stirs concerns over artificial intelligence
description: A fabricated photo seems to show a fiery explosion near the Pentagon and went viral. Now experts say it was likely created by AI, fueling concerns about the technology’s use on social media. NBC News’ Hallie Jackson has more details.

title: What China wants to improve relations with U.S. and why it may be a tall order
description: As the Biden administration and Beijing appeared to work to restart high-level talks, China sent its new ambassador to the U.S.

title: Orcas sank three boats off the coast of Portugal, but don't call them 'killer' just yet
description: Three recent incidents of orcas seemingly attacking and sinking boats off Iberian coast are drawing scrutiny over whether the animals deliberately swarmed the vessels and if they are learning the aggressive behavior from one another.

title: NYPD investigates another victim in connection to gay bar drugging scheme, police sources say
description: The NYPD is investigating another robbery linked to a criminal scheme — largely targeting men visiting gay bars — that has left two men dead, police sources say

title: Peloton aims to rebrand as a fitness company for all with a focus on app and tiered subscription pricing
description: When Peloton unveiled its 2019 holiday commercial depicting a husband who gifted his wife a stationary bike for Christmas, the ad was widely panned as sexist, dystopian and reminiscent of a hostage video.

title: Billionaire Harlan Crow again refuses to give senators information about relationship with Clarence Thomas
description: Harlan Crow's lawyer told Sen. Dick Durbin that the billionaire will not provide information on his relationship with Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas.

title: Elon Musk to host Ron DeSantis' 2024 announcement
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis will announce he is running for president during a chat with Twitter CEO Elon Musk, 3 sources familiar with the plans told NBC News.

title: 'We're not there yet': Debt ceiling talks still stuck on federal spending levels
description: Speaker Kevin McCarthy said Tuesday that bipartisan negotiators are not close to a deal but added that there was still time left to avert a  default.

title: Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention extended for three months
description: WASHINGTON — A Russian court on Tuesday extended American journalist Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention by about three months, until Aug. 30.

title: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez are engaged
description: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez are headed down the aisle.

title: Trump to appear virtually in New York criminal case for first time since arraignment
description: Former President Donald Trump is scheduled to make a virtual appearance in New York criminal court on Tuesday after pleading not guilty last month.

title: Chinese immigrants sue Florida for law banning certain nationals from buying property
description: A group of Chinese citizens living and working in Florida sued the state Monday over a new law that bans Chinese nationals from purchasing property in large swaths of the state.

title: South Carolina governor faces backlash for remark about hunting Democrats with dogs
description: South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster faces demands from state Democrats to apologize for a remark about hunting them with dogs.

title: Adobe adds generative AI to Photoshop
description: Adobe said Tuesday morning it would integrate generative artificial intelligence into its popular Photoshop editing software, making the application more accessible to untrained users.

title: Surgeon General warns of social media danger to mental health
description: Surgeon General Vivek Murthy discusses his new advisory warning about the potential harm social media has on young people’s mental health. “We see rates of depression and anxiety and suicide and loneliness going up among people and I’m concerned that social media is an important driver of that youth mental health crisis. We're issuing this advisory to sound the alarm." NBC's Hallie Jackson reports for TODAY.

title: Adobe unveils new AI features in Photoshop: Get a first look
description: Adobe is rolling out a new version of Photoshop that incorporates AI imagery to blend artificial objects or backgrounds into real photos by just typing a few words. The company has also introduced a content credential system that aims to help verify if an image has been altered by artificial intelligence. NBC’s Jacob Ward reports for TODAY.

title: Unpublished list reveals 3,400 San Francisco buildings may be at severe earthquake risk
description: A draft list of San Francisco concrete buildings reveals properties that the city says could be vulnerable to earthquakes and may need costly upgrades.

title: How many people are held in solitary confinement in U.S. prisons and jails? Now there’s a number.
description: A first-of-its-kind analysis is aiming to become a benchmark for tracking the full scope of solitary confinement in U.S. prisons and jails.

title: Don't expect Ron DeSantis to go scorched earth against Trump
description: When he formally launches his 2024 bid, Ron DeSantis will finally have the chance to declare open warfare on Donald Trump. But don't expect him to take it.

title: Social media may not be 'sufficiently safe for our kids', surgeon general warns
description: U.S. Surgeon General Vivek Murthy blames social media for rising rates of anxiety, depression and other mental health struggles among teens and adolescents.

title: Driver detained after truck crashes into security barriers near the White House
description: A driver was detained after a truck crashed into security barriers near the White House on Monday night, officials said. A Nazi flag was apparently retrieved from the scene.

title: Kari Lake loses another court battle in bid to overturn AZ gubernatorial defeat
description: More than six months after losing a bid to be Arizona's governor, former Republican candidate Kari Lake lost another court battle Monday in her effort to overturn Democrat Katie Hobbs' victory.

title: Volcano spews ash over Mexico City and disrupts travel at two major airports
description: The eruptive volcano named Popocatépetl continued to impact air travel in Mexico City on Monday after it caused weekend flight cancellations and delays.
